Projects.title: Our Selected Projects
Projects.description: A selection of our recent works built for global markets.
Projects.card_description1: Victor Sadygov Real Estate — an expert in luxury real estate in Dubai.
Projects.card_description2: We developed a website for Zusammen — an organization focused on the labor and social integration of migrants in Central Switzerland.
Projects.card_description3: A full-cycle architectural studio specializing in interior design and renovation in Dubai.
Projects.card_description4: We developed a website and a mobile application for Tez Kyzmat, a service that helps clients quickly find and order auto parts and automotive services in Kyrgyzstan.
Projects.card_description5: We developed a web catalog and an ERP system that объединяет all real estate properties into a unified database.
Projects.card_description6: We developed a premium website that conveys an atmosphere of exclusivity and brings all club services together in a stylish and user-friendly format.

What.title: What We Do
What.description: Full-cycle digital production for your business.
What.web_description: Custom, high-performance websites designed to convert.
What.mobile_description: iOS & Android apps with intuitive UI/UX.

About.title: About Our Studio
About.description: We are a digital studio specializing in web and mobile development, UX/UI design, and digital marketing.
About.video_description: Our approach combines aesthetics, technology, and strategy.
About.video_description2: Operations in UAE, Switzerland, USA, Kyrgyzstan & more.

Slider.description: “Thank you to the team for the amazing website! Everything was done carefully, thoughtfully, and exactly how we envisioned it. A pleasure to work with.”
